info.title: C2C E-Commerce API
info.description: RESTful API for the C2C (consumer-to-consumer) e-commerce marketplace. Supports user authentication, listings management, orders, reviews, and categories.

bearerAuth.description: Enter the JWT token obtained from POST /api/auth/login

post.description: Authenticates a user with email and password and returns a JWT token.

Validates the JWT and returns a confirmation. The client should discard
the token on its side. JWTs are stateless so server-side invalidation
is a no-op unless a blocklist is implemented.

hint.example: Discard the token on the client side

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's profile from the database.

post.description: Creates a new user account and returns a JWT token.

put.description: Updates an existing category. Admin only. Partial updates supported.

delete.description: Permanently removes a category. Admin only.

get.description: Returns all categories sorted alphabetically by name. Public endpoint.

post.description: Creates a new product category. Admin only.

get.description: Returns all reviews for a specific listing, including the reviewer name.

post.summary: Create a review for a listing
post.description:
Adds a review to a listing. Only buyers can review.
A user can only submit one review per listing.

get.description:
Returns a single listing with seller and category names.
Only active listings are visible publicly; the owner or admin can see any status.

put.description: Updates an existing listing. Only the owner seller or an admin may update. Partial updates supported.

delete.description: Permanently removes a listing. Only the owner seller or an admin may delete.

get.description:
Returns paginated active listings with optional filters.
When `sellerId` is provided, all statuses are returned (for seller dashboard).

parameters.name: sellerId
parameters.description: Filter by seller ID (returns all statuses)

post.description: Creates a new marketplace listing. Requires seller or admin role.

get.description: Returns a single order with its items. Only the buyer who placed it or an admin can view.

put.description:
Updates the status of an order.
- **Admin**: can change to any status.
- **Seller**: can only approve/reject pending orders that contain their listings.
When a seller approves, their listings in the order are marked as "sold".

400.description: Validation error or invalid status transition

delete.description: Permanently removes an order and its items. Admin only.

get.description:
Buyers see only their own orders. Admins see all orders.
Results are sorted by creation date (newest first).

post.description:
Creates a new order from one or more active listings.
Only buyers can place orders. Total is calculated server-side.

404.description: Listing not found or not active

get.description:
Returns orders that contain at least one item from the authenticated seller's
listings. Each order includes only the items belonging to the seller, plus
the buyer's name and email. Requires seller or admin role.

delete.description: Permanently removes a review. Only the reviewer or an admin can delete.

get.description: Returns a single user profile. Admin can view any user; regular users can only view themselves.

put.description:
Updates a user profile. Partial updates supported.
- **Self**: can update name, phoneNumber, password.
- **Admin**: can additionally update role.

delete.description: Permanently removes a user account. Admin only.

get.description: Returns all users sorted by creation date. Admin only. Passwords are excluded.
